function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of preparedness for unexpected major disruptions in the supply chain","Impact":"Disruption of supply chain operations, economic losses, and delays in essential goods and services","Mitigation":"Developing efficient and sustainable strategies for supply chain resilience and preparedness","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, advanced analytics, and predictive modeling","People":"Supply chain stakeholders, businesses, and consumers","Owner":"Supply chain management professionals, policy-makers, and businesses"},{"Description":"Gaps in academic literature related to collaboration, technology adoption, and knowledge creation in supply chain management","Impact":"Limited understanding of effective strategies and best practices in supply chain management, hindering innovation and improvement","Mitigation":"Further research and academic exploration of collaboration, technology adoption, and knowledge creation in supply chain management","Technologies":"Research and academic tools, collaboration platforms, and data analytics","People":"Academic researchers, supply chain professionals, and industry experts","Owner":"Academic institutions, research organizations, and industry associations"}]}
